B

BestMoveController - Class in org.klotski.controller
BestMoveController is a controller class that is used to do the best next move.
It dialogues with Window, NextBestMove and BoardImp.
It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
BestMoveController(Window, NextBestMove) - Constructor for class org.klotski.controller.BestMoveController
This constructor saved data from Window
Block - Class in org.klotski.graphics
Class Block that extends JPanel to set graphical pieces for basics elements in Klotski.
Block(int, int, int) - Constructor for class org.klotski.graphics.Block
Construct a new Block to instantiate a single piece with coordinates and type.
Board - Class in org.klotski.graphics
Class Board that extends JPanel to set graphical game board for Klotski game.
Board(BoardImp) - Constructor for class org.klotski.graphics.Board
Construct a new Board object that represent board graphically.
BoardImp - Class in org.klotski.coding
BoardImp is the main coding class.
It creates the Block array and sets it in the correct way.
It also checks for moves them and selects them.
It creates configuration for Board following Creator design pattern
BoardImp() - Constructor for class org.klotski.coding.BoardImp
Constructor that sets initial configuration to BoardImp.FIRST_CONFIGURATION = 1
BoardImp(int) - Constructor for class org.klotski.coding.BoardImp
Constructor that sets initial configuration to a given configuration
BoardSelectController - Class in org.klotski.controller
BoardSelectController is a controller class that is used to Select or Deselect a Block.
It dialogues with Board.
It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
BoardSelectController(Board) - Constructor for class org.klotski.controller.BoardSelectController
This constructor saved data from Board
buttonBackground - Variable in class org.klotski.graphics.Window
The background color of all the JButtons
